visual_desc: CLOSE UP on a defunct MILITARY BUNKER TERMINAL. The dark screen flashes its final status text: "FATALITY: 99.9%." The numbers vanish as the screen seamlessly overwrites itself with a flowing, luminescent interface graphic: *REALITY SYNTHESIS ACTIVE*.
variation_reason: Compared to the first frame, there are only minor changes in the compositionâ€”specifically, the content displayed on the terminal screen changes, while the camera remains static on the terminal.
ff_desc: A CLOSE UP shot focuses on a defunct MILITARY BUNKER TERMINAL. The screen is dark but flashes with the final status text: "FATALITY: 99.9%."
lf_desc: The CLOSE UP shot depicts the terminal screen now displaying a flowing, luminescent interface graphic reading: "REALITY SYNTHESIS ACTIVE".
motion_desc: The static text "FATALITY: 99.9%" vanishes from the screen, which then seamlessly overwrites itself with the flowing, luminescent interface graphic: *REALITY SYNTHESIS ACTIVE*.
audio_desc: [Sound Effect] Sharp, dying electronic beep followed by a high-frequency rising synth tone as the new text appears.
